snippet: The Czechoslovak-American Marionette Theater’s “A Christmas Carol, Oy! Hanukkah, Merry Kwanzaa” is essentially Dickens’s original tale, with a few dashes of multiculturalism.
abstract: Anita Gates reviews Czechoslovak-American Marionette Theater production of play A Christmas Carol, Oy! Hanukkah, Merry Kwanzaa, directed by and starring Vit Horejs, at La MaMa.
lead_paragraph: The Czechoslovak-American Marionette Theater’s “A Christmas Carol, Oy! Hanukkah, Merry Kwanzaa” is essentially Dickens’s original tale, with a few dashes of multiculturalism.

headline.seo: ‘A Christmas Carol, Oy! Hanukkah, Merry Kwanzaa’
headline.main: God (Gaia? Allah? Zeus?) Bless Us, Everyone
headline.kicker: Theater Review | 'A Christmas Carol, Oy! Hanukkah, Merry Kwanzaa'
